channel.title: Enterprise Performance Management on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprise Performance Management on FinanClub

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:251 Chances: Oracle Corp. has recently been recognized by Gartner for its cloud database solutions and autonomous database for transaction processing, demonstrating the company’s strong position in the cloud database management market. The introduction of new capabilities to Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) in conjunction with Deloitte’s implementation services shows Oracle’s commitment to meeting the complex tax requirements of multinational organizations.
